ISSUE.TITLE: 4.50 rc Uncaught TypeError: $(...).DataTable is not a function
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50 rc Steps to reproduce the problem: download 4.50 rc , install (region China, import sample data), open "/Admin/Product/List" Language: ZH or other added language (not import resource file) I have tested 5 regions at installation page: China,Hong Kong, Japana, USA, Canada China and Hong Kong (default use Chinese language) have this issue, including adding other language after installation. At others regions, there is no issue, also no issue after added orther languages like Chinese. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29729100/149645738-8bbcfa9c-60b2-4eea-8bd7-a705eca11b41.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29729100/149646652-481d2c96-0b0b-4b5f-bca3-7d00f7b3ae52.png)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6083 Excluded kendo messages scripts from the bundle
